org.primaresearch.dla.page.layout.logical

Class Layers

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.primaresearch.dla.page.layout.logical.Layers

  • public class Layers
extends java.lang.Object
    Container class for logical layers that can contain layout regions.
    Author:
    clc

      • createLayer

        public Layer createLayer(boolean addToFront)
        Creates, adds, and returns a new layer.
        Parameters:
        addToFront - Use true to add the layer to the front (topmost) or false to add it to the back.

      • sort

        public void sort()
        Sorts the layer list back (low z-index) to front (high z-index)
